Articles.Content: I was trying to build a shuttle replica, but couldn't get the engines to work propperly. what I had was three of the mainsails, but then I couldn't angle them all in the same direction easily.the only two Ideas I have for it are an angle mk.3 tank, for the three engines,placed on nodes, to atach to, or just heve pre-angled engines and put them on the struts. with the preangled parts, having about 5-10 parts or parts with a slider for adjustment would work.
